original_text: At the end of my letter, I want to say this to you: Be united with the Lord, so that you are strong. Then his great power will help you.
korean_text: 끝으로 너희가 주 안에서와 그 힘의 능력으로 강건하여지고

sentences.original_text: At the end of my letter
I want to say this to you:
Then his great power will help you
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그의 위대한 능력이 너를 도울 것이다
